BIOL 210 Course Agenda

Week 3, Sep 16-20

agenda-week3.Rmd

Reminders & Events

  • Remember to do prob sets, quizzes, and revisions!

  • Check your progress using the link under Course Materials dropdown menu

  • See assignments handed back in the Student Folders link in Course Materials dropdown menu

  • Oberlin Pre-Health Initiative: ObiePhi Community Meeting, Sat 9/21, Moffett Aud, 4-5:30pm. Snacks, games, updates, meet like-minded folks!

  • Biology seminar 9/20, 12:10-1:10pm, Craig, “Axon Guidance Signaling: Outside of the Nervous System”, Kate Laws, Randolph-Macon College

  • GYP-NEXTGEN paid summer research internship in Spain: https://www.jcu.edu/ires (Contact Mike Moore for more info); applications due Nov 1.

  • Oberlin Public Health Society (OPHS) along with the Student Leadership and Involvement Office is hosting a University Hospitals CPR training session on Tuesday September 24th from 5-8pm in Wilder Main Lounge. Sign-up link is here and the deadline to sign up is on Friday September 20th. There’s a limit of 27 spots.
